summary: A shorter version of Out 1, noli me tangere (1971), however some of the omitted scenes of the long version are included.
cast: Pierre Baillot|Gilette Barbier|Jean-Pierre Bastid|Juliet Berto|Michel Berto|René Biaggi|Ode Bitton|Jean Bouise|Marcel Bozonnet|Michel Delahaye|Jacques Doniol-Valcroze|Françoise Fabian|Hermine Karagheuz|Bernadette Lafont|Michael Lonsdale|Jean-Pierre Léaud|Michèle Moretti|Bulle Ogier|Éric Rohmer|Barbet Schroeder|Jean-François Stévenin
title: Out 1: Spectre
